it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT

Interface DHT<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the objects managed by the table.

    public interface DHT<T>
    Represents the interface used to interact with the distributed hash table (DHT).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create()
      Create a new DHT.
      void exec(java.lang.String key, Operation op)
      Executes the given Operation on the element associated with the specified key in the DHT.
      T get(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped, or null if this DHT contains no mapping for the key.
      void join(java.lang.String ip, java.lang.String nodeName)
      Join a DHT from the given entry point.
      void leave()
      Leaves the current DHT.
      void put(java.lang.String key, T value)
      Associates the specified value with the specified key in this DHT (optional operation).
      java.util.List<T> query(java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate)
      Returns a List of element from the DHT matching the given predicate.
      void remove(java.lang.String key)
      Removes the mapping for a key from this DHT if it is present.

      • get

        T get(java.lang.String key)
throws it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException
        Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped, or null if this DHT contains no mapping for the key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key whose associated value is to be returned
        Returns:
        the value to which the specified key is mapped, or null if this DHT contains no mapping for the key.
        Throws:
        it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException

      • put

        void put(java.lang.String key,
         T value)
  throws it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException
        Associates the specified value with the specified key in this DHT (optional operation). If the DHT previously contained a mapping for the key, the old value is replaced by the specified value.
        Parameters:
        key - key with which the specified value is to be associated
        value - value to be associated with the specified key
        Throws:
        it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String key)
     throws it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException
        Removes the mapping for a key from this DHT if it is present.
        Parameters:
        key - key whose mapping is to be removed
        Throws:
        it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException

      • query

        java.util.List<T> query(java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate)
                 throws it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException
        Returns a List of element from the DHT matching the given predicate.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate that the return values must match.
        Returns:
        a List of element from the DHT matching the given predicate.
        Throws:
        it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException

      • exec

        void exec(java.lang.String key,
          Operation op)
   throws it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException
        Executes the given Operation on the element associated with the specified key in the DHT. If no association is found, the value null is passed to the Operation.
        Parameters:
        key - key associated to the value on which executes the operation.
        op - the given operation.
        Throws:
        it.polimi.polishare.common.DHT.DHTException
